long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Xero Payslip Downloader

A convenient Chrome extension that allows you to batch download payslips from Xero Payroll quickly and efficiently.

## Features
- Batch download multiple payslips in one click
- Simple and intuitive date range selection
- Quick select options for common time periods (Last Month, 3 Months, 6 Months, 12 Months)
- Clear progress indicators and status updates
- Clean, modern interface that matches Xero's design language

## How to Use
1. Navigate to your Xero Payroll payslips page
2. Click the extension icon
3. Select your desired date range
4. Click "Download Payslips"
5. Your payslips will download automatically as PDF files

## Important Notes
- This extension has only been tested with Xero New Zealand Payroll
- Requires access to Xero Payroll with appropriate permissions
- Please ensure you have the necessary authorization to access payslips

## Privacy & Security
- This extension only operates on Xero Payroll pages
- No data is stored or transmitted to external servers
- All processing happens locally in your browser

## Support
If you find this extension helpful, consider buying me a coffee!

*Note: This is an unofficial tool and is not affiliated with, authorized, maintained, sponsored, or endorsed by Xero Limited or any of its affiliates.*
